comments.author: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.creator: bzbarsky@mit.edu
comments.raw_text: We have a whole bunch of performance bugs due to the slow performance of cairo's path tesselator; these only show up on Windows and Linux, because on Mac we use the CoreGraphics path stuff as far as I can tell.  This is a tracking bug for the issue so we can get a good idea of the scope of the issue (and have a list of things to test if the issue ever gets fixed upstream).
